full_summary:
### RFI: Project Delivery Services ## Request for Information

**Reference Number:** WS4519996584
**Tender Closing Date:** Wednesday, July 31st, 2024 at 2:00pm EDT
**Public Notice Release Date:** Thursday, April 10, 2024

**Project Overview**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites interested parties to provide information on project delivery services to inform the development of future procurement documents.

The Request for Information (RFI) process will consider industry feedback to:

* Informed procurement approach design
* Improved contract document development
* Enhanced delivery services to support the evolution of the Ontario Services Delivery (OSD) contracts.

**Key Deliverables and Expected Outcomes**

* Leverage industry expertise to identify innovative solutions and service combinations
* Gather feedback on potential procurement approaches
* Inform contract document enhancements

**Bid and Evaluation Guidelines**

The RFI will be evaluated based on the following:

* Responsiveness to the RFI questions
* Relevance of the feedback provided

### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns, please contact Marie-Éve Bouchard at [marie-eve.bouchard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:marie-eve.bouchard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Reference Documents

The full RFI can be accessed at: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19363293?extsite=MTkzNjMyOTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19363293?extsite=MTkzNjMyOTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
